biotools.summary:
Concomitant prediction of environmental fate and toxicity of chemical compounds.

Welcome to SVM Biodegradability predictor. This is a tool for predicting biodegradability and/or toxicity, based on the different definitions provided for some of the most popular compound databases. It is easy to use, just introduce a compound in SMILES format or draw its structure with the JSME editor, select the databases that you want to obtain a prediction for and press GO button.

bioschemas.name: iBiodegPred
